detail_desc: Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons, and patch front pockets. Tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in woven fabric with a smocked bodice, long balloon sleeves and a seam and peplum at the hem. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dungarees in a soft, patterned, organic cotton weave with straps that button at the front. Open side pockets, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a concealed silicone trim and short sleeves. Overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and buttons at the front. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The tunic is made partly from recycled polyester.

Shirt jacket in cotton corduroy with a matching belt. Collar, dropped shoulders, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam on the shoulders. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal welt pockets and a soft belt with metal D-rings.
3/4-length trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frills at the hems.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and straight, wide legs with creases.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains decorated with small plastic beads and round pendants. Adjustable length, 45-53 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a metal fastening at the front and a lace trim at the hem.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in a textured organic cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and patch front pockets. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.
Suede sandals with open sides and an ankle-high shaft with a zip at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. High slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Cap in soft, marled cotton jersey with a raised print on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
Fisherman’s hat in hard-washed cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim 6 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a faux-fur-lined hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, drawstring at the waist, ribbed cuffs and a single back vent. Flap pockets with a hook and loop fastening and decorative zips. Quilted lining.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Sweetheart neckline with a gathered seam at the front, short, wide sleeves with smocking at the hems, a seam under the bust and concealed elastication at the back. Unlined.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem, side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless lace playsuit in a double layer at the top with a cut-out section at the back, concealed press-studs at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem, designed to look like the bottom of a shirt.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs with stripes down the sides.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.

Fabric slippers in the style of ballet shoes with a decorative bow at the front and a glow-in-the-dark pattern. Glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted, V-neck tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in crushed velvet with a narrow shawl collar, front pockets, tape-trimmed inner seams and no buttons. Unlined.

Playsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and imitation suede belt. Chest pocket with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tab and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Paper hats with a metallic finish and elastic cord. Height 13 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 40x170 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered pattern on the front and down the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Chokers in thin metal in various designs. Adjustable length, 28-34 cm.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Dungarees in woven fabric with ties at the top, side pockets, a slightly lower waist and tapered legs.
Platform trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles. Platform approx. 5 cm.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in an organic cotton chambray weave with a small opening and sewn-on bow at the front, straps with fasteners, and patch front pockets. Lined.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Loop at the front and back and chunky patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Metal hoop earrings. Two different sizes: 4 cm and 7 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width 10 cm.
Shorts in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Slightly longer jacket in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist, welt pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Flared, calf-length skirt in flock-print tulle. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Large, rectangular hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 7.5 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and a smocked hem.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Pull-on shorts in stretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a regular waist. Zip fly and button, low crotch and straight, slightly wider legs.
